import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Contact.css'; import Footer from './Footer'; import {motion} from 'framer-motion'; function Contact() { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []) const slideIn = (direction, duration) => { const distance = direction === 'left' ? '-100%' : '100%'; return { initial: { x: distance, opacity: 0, }, animate: { x: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { duration: duration, ease: 'easeOut', }, }, }; }; return

Contact
} export default Contact;
